[File: volo-vault/sources/manage.move] [Fees] [Double Retrieval] Can retrieve_deposit_withdraw_fee be called by both admin and operator simultaneously for same fees? (High)
[File: volo-vault/sources/manage.move] [Locking] [Zero Lock Time] Can locking times be set to 0 to enable instant cancellation and withdrawal, removing all safety delays? (High)
[File: volo-vault/sources/manage.move] [Locking] [Excessive Lock Time] Can locking times be set to u64::MAX to permanently lock user funds? (Critical)
[File: volo-vault/sources/manage.move] [Locking] [Retroactive Application] Are locking time changes applied retroactively to existing requests/receipts? (High)
[File: volo-vault/sources/manage.move] [Locking] [Inconsistent Locks] Can locking_time_for_withdraw and locking_time_for_cancel_request be set to conflicting values causing logic errors? (Medium)
[File: volo-vault/sources/manage.move] [Loss Tolerance] [100% Loss Allowed] Can loss_tolerance be set to RATE_SCALING (10000 = 100%) allowing complete principal loss? (Critical)
[File: volo-vault/sources/manage.move] [Loss Tolerance] [Epoch Boundary Exploit] Can reset_loss_tolerance be called at epoch boundary to double the loss allowance? (High)
[File: volo-vault/sources/manage.move] [Loss Tolerance] [Base Value Manipulation] Can cur_epoch_loss_base_usd_value be manipulated through oracle changes to allow more losses? (High)
[File: volo-vault/sources/manage.move] [Loss Tolerance] [Tolerance Reset Spam] Can reset_loss_tolerance be called repeatedly to cause event spam or state thrashing? (Low)
[File: volo-vault/sources/manage.move] [Upgrade] [Forced Upgrade] Can upgrade functions be called on active vault with pending operations, corrupting request buffers? (Critical)
[File: volo-vault/sources/manage.move] [Upgrade] [Partial Upgrade] Can vault be upgraded without upgrading reward_manager and oracle_config, causing version mismatch? (High)
[File: volo-vault/sources/manage.move] [Upgrade] [Version Rollback] Can VERSION constant be decreased in future to allow downgrade attacks? (Medium)
[File: volo-vault/sources/manage.move] [Upgrade] [State Migration] Do upgrade functions properly migrate all tables, bags, and nested structures? (High)
[File: volo-vault/sources/manage.move] [Operator] [Unlimited Operators] Can admin create unlimited operator caps, proliferating access points? (Medium)
[File: volo-vault/sources/manage.move] [Operator] [Freeze Bypass] Can frozen operator still access retrieve_deposit_withdraw_fee_operator function? (Critical)
[File: volo-vault/sources/manage.move] [Operator] [Freeze Race] Can operator execute malicious operation immediately before being frozen? (High)
[File: volo-vault/sources/manage.move] [Operator] [Wrong Operation Object] Can set_operator_freezed be called with wrong Operation shared object, corrupting freeze state? (High)
[File: volo-vault/sources/manage.move] [Operator] [Unfreeze Timing] Can malicious operator be unfrozen at strategic time to execute harmful operation? (Medium)
